    • countPerMonth

      @Query("SELECT month(dueDate) as month, count(*) as deliveries FROM OrderInfo o where o.state=?1 and year(dueDate)=?2 group by month(dueDate)") List<Object[]> countPerMonth(OrderState orderState, int year)

    • sumPerMonthLastThreeYears

      @Query("SELECT year(o.dueDate) as y, month(o.dueDate) as m, sum(oi.quantity*p.price) as deliveries FROM OrderInfo o JOIN o.items oi JOIN oi.product p where o.state=?1 and year(o.dueDate)<=?2 AND year(o.dueDate)>=(?2-3) group by year(o.dueDate), month(o.dueDate) order by y desc, month(o.dueDate)") List<Object[]> sumPerMonthLastThreeYears(OrderState orderState, int year)

    • countPerDay

      @Query("SELECT day(dueDate) as day, count(*) as deliveries FROM OrderInfo o where o.state=?1 and year(dueDate)=?2 and month(dueDate)=?3 group by day(dueDate)") List<Object[]> countPerDay(OrderState orderState, int year, int month)

    • countPerProduct

      @Query("SELECT sum(oi.quantity), p FROM OrderInfo o JOIN o.items oi JOIN oi.product p WHERE o.state=?1 AND year(o.dueDate)=?2 AND month(o.dueDate)=?3 GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY p.id") List<Object[]> countPerProduct(OrderState orderState, int year, int month)
